Intro

  • This page provides insight into three relatively young funds with minimal distributions to date

  • We provide a straightforward portfolio summary analysis followed by:

    • Extensive modeling results

    • Simulations of similar styled funds with their respective modeling results

  • We also provide a few stylized simulation examples at the end …

Future Visions

  • Currently, we need to develop a very robust quality control process

  • The next step would likely be running models over the weekend and providing results on the following Monday with daily naive updates through the week

  • At a later stage, we envision user uploads, and on-command modeling (something like the video)
